text: (Woh khoob jaanta hai un kanjoos daulat-mandon ko) jo ba-raza (willingly) o ragbat dene waley ehle iman ki maali qurbaniyon par baatein chant-te hain aur un logon ka mazaq udate hain jinke paas (raah e khuda mein dene ke liye) uske siwa kuch nahin hai jo woh apne upar mushakkat bardasht karke detey hain. Allah in mazaq udane walon ka mazaq udata hai aur inke liye dardnaak saza hai
